page_lead:
Through 2010, we provided more than 1 million hearing aids to people in
need worldwide. We commit to providing 1 million more this decade.

hearing_mission_statistics.tagline: OUR HEARING AID COMMITMENT THIS DECADE
OUR HEARING AID COMMITMENT THIS DECADE
OUR HEARING AID COMMITMENT THIS DECADE

content_tabs.content_title: More than 360 million people worldwide have a disabling hearing loss.
content_tabs.content:
Yet many do not have access to the hearing care that can help them. We address this problem by developing sustainable systems of care globally. Each year, we fit more than 100,000 hearing aids to people in need. We have worked in more than 100 countries and are committed to providing 1 million hearing aids this decade.

The wort Starkey Hearing Foundation highlights a transfer of services to the community level in order to facilitate sustainability. We develop a coherent and measurable model for hearing health delivery with strategic partners in recipient countries.
